## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                            | Type               | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ | -------- |
| `type`   | `type`    | Type of the toggle - determines what it controls 'mode': toggles between 'fuzzy' and 'normal' 'sort': toggles between 'asc' and 'desc' | `"mode" \| "sort"` | `'mode'` |
